0.0: In this game you are a space-trader and you want to sell as many of your goods to different aliens.
1.0: To do so, you board a space-ship in the morning that takes you to one of two planets, where the aliens live.
1.1: On each planet there are two aliens. You have to decide which one you want to trade with.
2.0: If the alien is interested in your goods, it will buy them and you get a point.
2.1: If it is not interested, you do not get any points and have to travel back home.
3.0: It is hard to tell how interested the aliens are in your goods.
3.1: But if an alien buys your goods often, it is probably interested in them.
3.2: The alien's interest may change with time. An alien that is interested now, might lose interest over time, or vice versa.
4.0: If the alien was interested recently, it might be a good idea to visit them again.
4.1: If the alien was not interested, you might want to visit a different alien.
4.2: The aliens keep their trading a secret from each other. Each alien has their own individual interest, which is not influenced by their home planet. One alien does not influence any of the other aliens.
5.0: To sell your goods to the aliens, you have to board a spaceship
5.1: The shape of the spaceship indicates the different travel companies. Each company flies to a different plant.

6.0: The landing ports are not fixed. So the spaceships are not always on the same side of the screen. So pay attention.
6.1: When you see the spaceships on the screen, you have 2 seconds to decide. Pless LEFT to select the spaceship on the left. Press RIGHT to select the spaceship on the right.
6.2: Do not take too much time for your decisions, or the spaceships will leave without you and you have to wait for the next day.
7.0: The companies are very reliable and most flights arrive at the correct planet.
7.1: But interplanetary space travel is risky and unpredictable, and sometimes pirates visit one of the planets.
7.2: When this happens the spaceship will fly to the other planet. Because you are usually asleep during the flight, you will only notice when you arrive
7.3: Nothing is lost, however, you can still trade with the aliens that live on the other planet. The pirates only influence your current space travel and do not influence the alien's interest your goods.
8.0: There are two aliens on each planet. But you can only visit one of them, before you need to return home.
8.1: After you arrive at a planet, and you see the aliens you have to 2 seconds to decide with which alien you want to trade.
8.2: Press LEFT to try to sell your goods to the alien on the left and RIGHT to try to sell your goods to the alien on the right.
9.0: If you are too slow you need to hurry back to the spaceship to catch your ride home and you will need to wait for the next day.
9.1: The aliens do not always appear on the same side of the screen, so pay attention to the alien's shape when selecting the alien you want to trade with.
